Support.navigator

Interface INavigator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, TNavigator

    public interface INavigator
    Contains generalised methods of page navigator component.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPage(IPage page)
      Adds a page to the navigator component.
      IPage getPage(int pageIndex)
      Retrieves the page object associated by pageIndex.
      boolean isPageExists(int pageIndex)
      Tells whether the page associated by pageIndex exists or not.
      void showActualPage()
      Displays the actual page.
      void showAPage(int pageIndex)
      Displays the page associated by pageInndex.

    • Method Detail

      • addPage

        void addPage(IPage page)
      throws TError
        Adds a page to the navigator component.
        Parameters:
        page - The object instance of a page class implementing IPage.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • showActualPage

        void showActualPage()
             throws TError
        Displays the actual page.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • showAPage

        void showAPage(int pageIndex)
        throws TError
        Displays the page associated by pageInndex.
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The unique index of the page.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • getPage

        IPage getPage(int pageIndex)
       throws TError
        Retrieves the page object associated by pageIndex.
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The unique index of the page.
        Returns:
        The page object if found by pageIndex otherwise TError is thrown.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.

      • isPageExists

        boolean isPageExists(int pageIndex)
        Tells whether the page associated by pageIndex exists or not.
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The unique index of the page.
        Returns:
        True if page exists otherwise false.
